Image import/export

This part of the manual describes how to import and export images in various formats. This document is dedicated both to DGtal users and developers.

Table of contents:

  1. Overall usage
    1. Colormaps
  2. File formats
    1. Image formats in 2-D
    2. Image formats in 3-D
    3. Image formats in n-D

Colormaps

Image::ValueType to RGB color conversion.

TODO

File formats

Image formats in 2-D

  • PNM/NetPBM formats: PNMReader and PNMWriter
    • PPM: RGB values (ASCII mode)
    • PGM: grayscale values (ASCII mode)
  • All image formats handled by ImageMagick: MagickReader and MagickWriter

Image formats in 3-D

  • Variants of PNM/NetPBM formats in 3D: PNMReader and PNMWriter
    • PPM3D: RGB values (ASCII mode)
    • PGM3D: grayscale values (ASCII mode)
  • Vol format (Simplevol project, http://liris.cnrs.fr/david.coeurjolly): VolReader and VolWriter

Image formats in n-D

  • Raw foramts (binary file with raw values using the HyperRectDomain::Iterator order): RawReader and RawWriter
    • Raw8: import/export on raw 8bits
